name: White Otaru Night
description:
Join us and your favorite Golden Kamuy guys for the release of the unofficial GK dating simulator!

Explore Otaru and keep an eye out for someone to spend the evening with. Choose your words wisely and you may just talk your way into a hot date.

...Or not.

Over the last three years, we’ve poured a lot of love into bringing our favorite Golden Kamuy characters to life in this lighthearted visual novel. 

What started out with a few sketches and throwaway lines turned into a major project that we’re delighted to finally share with the GK fandom. We hope you all enjoy it as much as we have.

Thank you for all your support!

[NOTE 8/1/2021: There is no sound or music in the game; we did not get that far and prioritized releasing the game over adding sound. Thank you for your kind patience, and we hope you enjoy the game while listening to your favorite music!]

[NOTE 8/1/2021: RenPY allowed build distributions for Windows, Linux, and Mac; our apologies for the inconvenience for folks with tablets/phones of various sorts that do not work with the game.]
